name: Dr.Sai Sundara Krishnan G
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Maths )  - American College, Madurai   - 1988M.Sc  ( Maths )  - American College, Madurai   - 1991M.Phil  ( Maths )  - Madurai KamaraJ University  - 04/30/1994Ph.D  ( Maths )  - Bharathiar University  - 05/09/2006Supervisor: K.Balachandran
in_brief: Dr G. Sai Sundara Krishnan is a Professor in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences. He has more than 25 years of teaching experience. His research focuses on Digital Topology and Algebraic Topology. He has guided 11 PhDs and currently supervising oneresearch scholar, under Anna University :: Chennai, in the fields of Topology, Fluid Dynamics and Soft set theory. He is the Programme Coordinator of MSc Applied Mathematics Programme.
